attributes.additional_details: If people can afford cigarettes or tobacco they can afford the units, as they purport to be cheaper than 'smoking'.  The NHS is already stretched to its limits - we must not pay for anything unless it is proven to help with stopping smoking, and for no other reason.
attributes.background: The Minister of Health says the NHS will prescribe Vaping Units to smokers.  These are not proven to help people to stop smoking and they are also not proven to be safe.
